name: humor-memory-game-frontend
description: Frontend for Humor Memory Game - DevOps Learning Edition

scripts.build: npm run copy-assets && npm run minify
scripts.copy-assets: mkdir -p dist && cp -r public/* dist/ && cp -r src/* dist/
scripts.start: npm run build && python3 -m http.server 8080 --directory dist

author: DevOps Learning Team
